# VisualShaderNodeDeterminant

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Calculates the determinant of a [Transform3D](class_transform3d.md) within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translates to ``determinant(x)`` in the shader language.
